name: SJF Consulting
goal: SJF Consulting is a Brussels-based consultancy company. We aim at providing our clients with high quality services in the areas of Public Affairs, Strategic Advice and Association Management
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Consumer Affairs, Education, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Copyright, Digital Agenda, Digital Single Market, Contract rules for Digital content, Geoblocking, portability, AVMSD, ePrivacy, Platform agenda
